description: '''Cimarr贸n''' is a Colombian musical group of [[Joropo|festive dance music joropo]] from the plains of the [[Venezuela]]. This Grammy-nominated band makes Latin music with Andalusian, Indigenous American native and African roots. Their music includes four-stringed [[Cuatro (instrument)|cuatro]], [[harp]], [[maraca]]s, and also [[Caj贸n de rumba|Peruvian-flamenco caj贸n]], [[Surdo|Brazilian surdo]], [[Tambora (Dominican drum)|afro-Colombian tambora]], a stomp dance as a percussion component and tribal indigenous whistles.
